ResearchProjectDef.label: rootcraft
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to process fallen dryads into useful essences and craft basic items from their remains. This ancient knowledge allows neolithic and medieval colonies to make use of dryadic materials without advanced technology.

ResearchProjectDef.label: spagyric alchemy
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the secrets of dryadic alchemy. Learn to brew potions and draughts from dryad essences that can enhance colonists' abilities, though often with risks and side effects.

ResearchProjectDef.label: essence grafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Master the dangerous art of grafting dryadic essences directly into living tissue. This allows for permanent biological enhancements, but requires careful surgical procedures and carries significant risks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dryadic effigies
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to construct effigies from dryad corpses that can produce resources indefinitely. These macabre but efficient structures harness the lingering essence of fallen dryads to generate materials continuously.

ResearchProjectDef.label: dryadic armaments
ResearchProjectDef.description: Forge weapons and armor from dryadic essences, creating equipment that retains some of the mystical properties of the fallen dryads. These armaments often provide unique benefits beyond their material properties.

ResearchProjectDef.label: awakened essences
ResearchProjectDef.description: Unlock the ultimate secrets of dryadic manipulation. Learn to work with awakened dryad essences to create incredibly powerful items and structures. This pinnacle of dryadtech requires mastery of all previous techniques and access to awakened dryads.
